title: Beer, Beer, and More Beer (barley ethanol, NicoShot, and TurboTap)
body: <p>No, I'm not talking about <a href="http://www.morebeer.com/" title="B3: Beer, Beer, and More Beer: The Store">the store</a> (although they have been great to order from for all my extract homebrewing goodness), I'm talking about three recent articles that caught my eye that I haven't really had time to blog about until my lunch hour today.</p><p>The first is about <a href="http://www.canadiandriver.com/news/050713-6.htm" title="Researchers working on barley ethanol, Eh?">beer powered cars</a>. Well, it's close, it's about making ethanol from barley. (from <a href="http://hybrids.autoblog.com/entry/1234000170050320/" title="USDA developing barley-based ethanol">AutoBlog</a>)</p><p>The next is about <a href="http://www.nacsonline.com/NR/exeres/00005c1fqinhgjwlkkccdhgy/NewsPosting.asp?NRMODE=Published&amp;NRORIGINALURL=%2fNACS%2fNews%2fnd0713054%2ehtm&amp;NRNODEGUID=%7bB0408DDD-61E6-488B-ACFE-C30BCD192344%7d&amp;NRQUERYTERMINATOR=1&amp;cookie%5Ftest=1" title="A Frosty Brew to Help Smokers Quit?">beer with nicotene added</a>. Since smoking is now about as uncool as it gets, and it's illegal in NY bars, people need their nicotene via other methods. I have vague recollections of 7th grade health when they told us nicotene + alcohol was bad for some reason, but I don't remember why or care very much. (from <a href="http://www.gizmodo.com/gadgets/gadgets/household/nicoshot-beer-with-nicotine-112370.php" title="NicoShot: Beer with Nicotine">Gizmodo</a>)</p><p>The last is about <a href="http://www.turbotap.com/" title="TurboTap - Pour Faster, Better Beer">this sweet beer nozzle</a> that can <a href="http://www.turbotap.com/Guinness/" title="Turbo Guiness... *DROOL*">pour a Guiness in record time</a>. If I had a bar, or a keg system of some sort, I'd definitely look into it. (from <a href="http://www.gizmodo.com/gadgets/gadgets/turbo-tap-beer-fast-113192.php" title="Turbo Tap – Beer. Fast.">Gizmodo</a>)</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2005-07-19

Beer, Beer, and More Beer (barley ethanol, NicoShot, and TurboTap)

No, I'm not talking about
Researchers working on barley ethanol, Eh?
A Frosty Brew to Help Smokers Quit?
